summary.span: 表示 的 对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定义的架构，并确定哪些类型的每个数据可以包含。The defines the schema of a , and determines what kind of data each can contain. 您可以访问通过属性的对象。You can access the through the property of the object. 使用并方法来插入和删除对象。The uses the and methods to insert and delete objects. 使用属性来确定多少对象是集合中。Use the property to determine how many objects are in the collection. 使用方法验证集合中是否存在指定的索引或列名称。Use the method to verify whether a specified index or column name exists in the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例循环访问一系列对象并打印集合中每个列的各种属性。The following example iterates through a collection of objects and prints various properties of each column in the collection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法执行多个检查在返回之前`true`或`false`结果。The method performs several checks before returning a `true` or `false` result. 这包括以下: 列中是否存在、 属于表，或约束或关系中涉及到。This includes the following: whether the column exists, belongs to the table, or is involved in a constraint or relation. 使用方法之前尝试从集合中删除任何列。Use the method before you try to remove any column from a collection. 此外可以使用方法来确定特定列存在之前尝试将其删除。You can also use the method to determine whether a particular column exists before you try to remove it. ## Examples 下面的示例首先使用方法，以确定是否在集合中找到的特定列。The following example first uses the method to determine whether a particular column is found in the collection. 如果找到，方法测试是否可以移除该列。If found, the method tests whether the column can be removed. 如果使用，则删除该列方法。If so, the column is removed with the method. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.CanRemove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.CanRemove Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.CanRemove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.CanRemove Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以确定列是否存在之前执行其他操作的列。Use the method to confirm the existence of a column before you perform additional operations on the column. 该方法将返回`false`时两个或多个列具有相同的名称，但不同的命名空间。The method returns `false` when two or more columns have the same name but different namespaces. 如果存在任何多义性，恰好一列的列名称进行匹配时，不会成功调用。The call does not succeed if there is any ambiguity when matching a column name to exactly one column. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法和方法，以确定是否可以删除列。The following example uses the method and the method to determine whether the column can be removed. 如果是这样，则删除该列。If so, the column is removed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当搜索的列名称时，有条件地区分大小写。 is conditionally case-sensitive when it searches for column names. 例如，如果一个名为"mydatacolumn"和另一个名为"Mydatacolumn"，用于搜索的某一列的字符串件为区分大小写。For example, if one is named "mydatacolumn" and another is named "Mydatacolumn", a string used to search for one of the columns is regarded as case-sensitive. 但是，如果存在"mydatacolumn"和"Mydatacolumn"不，被件，不区分大小写的搜索字符串。However, if "mydatacolumn" exists and "Mydatacolumn" does not, the search string is regarded as case-insensitive. ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性可打印的值由索引指定的对象。The following example uses the property to print the value of a object specified by index. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.this1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.this1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.this1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.this1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The collection does not have a column with the specified name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveAt(int32 index) cil managed

span.span: The index of the column to remove.

summary.span: 从集合中移除指定索引位置的列。

span.span: Removes the column at the specified index from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果集合已成功更改通过添加或删除列，事件发生。If the collection is successfully changed by adding or removing columns, the event occurs. ## Examples 下面的示例首先使用方法，以确定是否在集合中找到的特定列。The following example first uses the method to determine whether a particular column is found in the collection. 如果找到，方法测试是否可以移除该列。If it is found, the method tests whether the column can be removed. 如果使用，则删除该列方法。If so, the column is removed with the method. span.span: The collection does not have a column at the specified index.
